edge_1: Glass half-buried alive in a makeshift grave while Hawk holds Fitzgerald at gunpoint and shouts for Bridger, who is away gathering water.
edge_2: After the others leave, Fitzgerald attempts to smother Glass but is stopped when Glass's son Hawk intervenes. Fitzgerald stabs Hawk to death as Glass watches helplessly.
